page.title: 12Spitals Cross Housing Est. 2
page.content: Before moving to Edenbridge many of them livedin flats and other council properties in the South-East area. People down with their factories when the factory set up in Edenbridge and the esatate was primarily built for this reason. Some people when they moved gave up their jobs or retired. Others changed their jobs or took up training for another job. Many of the children on the Estate of school age got to the local schools. A small minority of the children go out of town to Grammar or Private schools.
